American TV chef Anton Brown believes that you should only buy a kitchen gadget that has more than one function – like a toaster, slow cooker, microwave, air fryer and sandwich press! When it’s my turn to cook, I like to spend as little time in the kitchen as possible, and these appliances help me do that while cooking so much more than you’d think is possible.
VIEW OUR WIDE RANGE OF KITCHEN APPLIANCES
The marvellous microwave
It can warm up leftovers and defrost meat, but it can also cook these dishes quicker than a stove or oven can:
One-pot mac ‘n cheese – recipe
Spaghetti squash – recipe
Poached eggs – recipe
Baked potatoes – recipe
Mushroom risotto – recipe
Cake – recipe
and even…
Peanut brittle – recipe
Choose from our range of microwaves
Safety tip: Never put anything metal or with a metallic trim in the microwave because it can cause an electrical fire.

The humble toaster
A toaster isn’t just for bread. It defrosts and reheats certain foods even better than a microwave. Keep these foods crispy by warming them in a toaster placed on its side:
Pizza slices
Waffles
Burger patties
You can even make these in your toaster…
Grilled sweet potatoes – recipe
Tacos – recipe
Choose from our range of toasters and breakfast packs
Safety tip: Never place metal cutlery in your toaster because you could electrocute yourself.

The versatile sandwich press
A panini press can turn any simple sandwich into something you’d be served at a restaurant, but it can also cook:
Omelettes – recipe
Hash browns – recipe
Burgers – recipe
Chicken breasts – recipe
Grilled veggies – recipe
Bacon – recipe
and even…
Flatbread – recipe
Choose from our range of sandwich presses
Safety tip: Never leave your sandwich press unattended while it’s on.

The surprising slow cooker
The best thing about a slow cooker is that it doesn’t need supervision. You can pack it with ingredients and go do something else for the next few hours and come back to perfectly good stew, soup, stock or…
Mielie pap – recipe
Roast chicken – recipe
Deep-dish pizza – recipe
Banana bread – recipe
and even…
Cheesecake – recipe
Choose from our range of slow cookers
Safety tip: You can leave your slow cooker to simmer while you’re home, but don’t forget about it.

The amazing air fryer
Yes, it’s good for making fried food without unhealthy fats, but what else can it do when you’re not looking?
Steak – recipe
Brownies – recipe
Apple chips – recipe
Stuffed peppers – recipe
Mini quiches – recipe
and even…
Pasta bake – recipe
Choose one of our air fryers
Safety tip: You can leave your air fryer cooking without supervision, but remember to set a timer so you don’t burn your food.

I hope I’ve given you some good ideas for fuss-free cooking. At HomeChoice, we have handy appliances for every household task, in and out of the kitchen. Have a look and you might find something you didn’t know you needed.
